label: The Charmer of Pengersick
column5: Grim tales surrounded the original Pengersick Castle and its inhabitants
column6: particularly a lord who dabbled in sorcery and his mysterious Saracen bride whose enchanting voice could tame even the foulest practices. Their extraordinary lives ended abruptly when the castle was consumed by flames on a stormy night
column7: leading to their mysterious disappearance and the eventual construction of a new
column8: more peaceful version of the castle.
